entry.title: yetanotherco/aligned_layer
entry.summary: Aligned is a verification layer for zero-knowledge proofs using EigenLayer. Our mission is to accelerate the adoption of zero-knowledge and validity proofs on Ethereum.

entry.summary: iOS and Android push notifications for Elixir
